column5: Back about 12 or so years ago my brother used to run a charter service. We caught some great fish with fishwitches but now I cant find them anywhere. I know the company was forsale at one time I guess they went under. anyone know? or have a few of these kicking around they dont want?
Ya, used to buy them at Pennys in Thornbury, haven't seen them for sale for a couple years now, and, when it comes to spoons I either use the Silver Fox or Fishwitch.
